name: Day68077
description:
Small gamejam game made in 2 full days + 2 weekday evenings.

There are no sounds in this.

It's a mess.

But it works. Kind of.

PC VR ONLY.
Tested on Quest2 with Link, as well as Index through SteamVR. Should also work with other PC VR HMDs.

Controls:
Lower left facebutton to activate teleport.
Right thumbstick to rotate.
Grab to grab stuff.
Move your hands to move your hands.

Don't let everyone onboard die. 

Good luck!
